subject: Sales
title: Elon Musk: Selling the Future
description: Learn Elon Musk: Selling the Future in one minute.

hook.text: Musk sells cars, rockets, and brain implants. His actual product is tomorrow itself.

buildup.text: Tesla nearly died in 2008. Musk tweeted, blogged, and presented his way back from the edge.

discovery.text: He doesn't pitch specs. He sells a narrative: humanity must become multi-planetary to survive.

twist.text: His polarizing behavior would sink most leaders. But the mission is bigger than the messenger.

climax.text: His ability to sell impossible futures and then actually deliver them remains unmatched.

punchline.text: He sells tomorrows. The market buys them today.

quiz.question: What is Musk's core sales narrative?
